properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
CYPRUS.
DNC 10.
VESSEL DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO
ENGINE FAILURE IN 33-55.83N 034-07.92E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LARNACA,
INMARSAT-C: 870772545696,
TELEX: 421099999,
PHONE: 357 2464 3005,
FAX: 357 2464 3254.
